etomica.potential

Class P3AxilrodTeller

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.potential.P3AxilrodTeller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPotential, IPotentialAtomic

    public class P3AxilrodTeller
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPotentialAtomic
    Axilrod-Teller potential. The potential is atomic. Ionization energy and polarizability are required as input for each atom type.
